mapper.select: select idx, userpw, pinno, joindate ,REGEXP_REPLACE(userid, '.', '*', 4) as userid ,REGEXP_REPLACE(username, '.', '*', 2) as username ,REGEXP_REPLACE(phone,'(\d{3})\-(\d{3,4})\-(\d{4})','\1-****-\3') as phone ,CONCAT('***',SUBSTR(email, 4, LENGTH(email))) as email FROM spring_member

/* 년도 기준 나이 */ SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN age < 10 THEN 1 END) "10세미만" , COUNT(CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 10 AND 19 THEN 1 END) "10대" , COUNT(CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN 1 END) "20대" , COUNT(CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN 1 END) "30대" , COUNT(CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN 1 END) "40대" , COUNT(CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN 1 END) "50대" , COUNT(CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 60 AND 69 THEN 1 END) "60대" , COUNT(CASE WHEN age BETWEEN 70 AND 79 THEN 1 END) "70대" , COUNT(CASE WHEN age >= 80 THEN 1 END) "80세이상" FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyy') - CONCAT(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(pinno,8,1) IN ('1','2') THEN '19' ELSE '20' END, SUBSTR(pinno,1,2)) AS age FROM spring_member )
SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(pinno,8,1) IN ('1','3') THEN 1 END) "men" , COUNT(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(pinno,8,1) IN ('2','4') THEN 1 END) "women" FROM spring_member
